TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonTextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.TextBox implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class RibbonTextBox Inherits TextBox Implements ICommandSource
public ref class RibbonTextBox : System::Windows::Controls::TextBox, System::Windows::Input::ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示文字方塊，用於控制項中。

span.span: Represents a text box that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示的範例控制項在大型、 中型和小型的變化，以及使用任何映像。The following illustration shows examples of controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images. ![功能區文字方塊控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-textbox.png "功能區文字方塊控制項")![Ribbon text box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-textbox.png "Ribbon text box controls") 功能區文字方塊控制項Ribbon text box controls ## Examples 下列範例顯示要建立的標記大型影像、 小型影像，與標籤的控制項。The following example shows the markup to create a control with a large image, a small image, and a label. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonTextBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbontextbox)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

span.span: The keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且必須包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 按鍵提示有時也稱為快速鍵或快速鍵，而且可用以啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 當您按下 ALT 鍵，按鍵提示會出現在功能區上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 在套用新的範本時，建置 的視覺化樹狀結構。

span.span: Builds the visual tree for the when a new template is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序 (例如重建配置傳遞) 呼叫 方法時，就會叫用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnGotKeyboardFocus(class System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnGotKeyboardFocus (e As KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 當這個控制項取得鍵盤焦點時，提供 事件的類別處理，並啟用鍵盤焦點視覺化樣式。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event and enables the keyboard focus visual when this control gets keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫預設行為，並且取得這個控制項的鍵盤焦點時，可讓鍵盤焦點視覺效果。This method overrides the default behavior and enables the keyboard focus visual when this control gets keyboard focus. 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 當這個控制項失去鍵盤焦點時，提供 事件的類別處理，並停用鍵盤焦點視覺化樣式。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event and disables the keyboard focus visual when this control loses keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫預設行為，這個控制項失去鍵盤焦點時，將鍵盤焦點視覺效果會停用。This method overrides the default behavior and disables the keyboard focus visual when this control loses keyboard focus. 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含指定的映像和控制項相關聯的標籤的大小和可見性資訊的屬性。A contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control. 此屬性指定的映像和標籤顯示的方式快速存取工具列中裝載此控制項時。This property specifies how the image and label will appear when this control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

span.span: The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.

value.span: 已註冊的預設值是 。

value.span: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每個功能區控制項繼承屬性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果屬性設定後，將不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示，會改為顯示標準的工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示用來建立增強型工具提示的標記。The following example shows the markup used to create the enhanced ToolTip. ![增強型工具提示](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "增強型工具提示")![Enhanced ToolTip](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "Enhanced ToolTip") 增強型工具提示Enhanced ToolTip [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonTextBoxTT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbontextboxtt)]
